blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: phandomwatch
blog.title: Phandom Watch Fest
blog.description:
Get your seats comfy and your snacks ready as we explore the wonderful world of Dan & Phil! 
Interested? Visit our "Show Info" page to know how we do it or follow us on twitter for more updates!

summary: Our next Phandom Watch Fest will be a special PINOF MARATHON! We are planning to host it on Sunday, November 25th! We will be...
caption:
Our next Phandom Watch Fest will be a special PINOF MARATHON!

We are planning to host it on Sunday, November 25th! We will be testing ways that will allow all of us to watch together at once and chat!

More info will be posted in the upcoming days! 

Save the date! :)

summary: aight i’m just gonna say it... I miss Dan’s channel. I miss his videos. I know he’s in a rough patch and is kinda putting it off...
body:
aight i’m just gonna say it…

I miss Dan’s channel. I miss his videos.

I know he’s in a rough patch and is kinda putting it off and of course I want him to do things on his own time but like… i miss his channel so. fucking. much.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: Office (AU’s) Masterlist
body:
Links Last Checked: May 22nd, 2019

Acknowledged - trysomecats

Summary: Rich CEO Phil Lester meets Dan Howell, an adorable pastel-colored boy who is looking for a job, and decides that he has to hire him immediately.

Ain’t That Just What Christmas Is All About? - howellslester

Summary: Christmas is the one time of the year Phil really hates in the office. It’s all Vic’s fault, really, because being the boss (albeit not a very good one) he orders mandatory fun and games for a week, when Phil would much rather be doing his brainwashing job.

Business Trip - washedoutgay

Summary: Phil starts a job and sadly gets paired with a rather grouchy man to go on a business trip with, but a different emotion to hatred is discovered on the trip.

Christmas Candy Grams - auroraphilealis

Summary: Dan gets a candy gram at his workplace from a secret admirer calling him an angel, but Dan has absolutely no idea who it could be.

Daydreams - placingglaciers

Summary: Nothing like a Christmas-in-July party can’t fix for two shy office crushes!

Down To Business - phanimist

Summary: Phil’s got a business meeting, and he’s lucky that he makes it there on time with seconds to spare. he takes the last available seat at the back of the room, which happens to be next to a pretty brunette who ends up making sarcastic remarks and jokes under his breath the whole time. Phil isn’t complaining, though. If anything, he’s glad that that he was almost late.

Fixing The Connection - jestbee

Summary: Dan has had a crush on the IT guy in his office for ages, not that he’ll ever admit to it.

“Get On Your Knees” - your-precious-phan-blog

Summary: Phil loves to tease Dan during work hours.

Here’s To Our Story (ao3) - amczingphil

Summary: Dan is a bored office worker with a crush on the cute IT guy - Phil.

Naturally Dan decides that the best way to get Phil’s attention would be to fabricate a series of technical issues that he has to call Phil to help with. It’s just a shame Dan wasn’t a little less transparent.

How To Get Away With Marriage - humhowellelujah

Summary: Dan works at a small office doing coffee runs. His boss, Mr. Lester, needs Dan to do him a favor while his parents are in town for the next couple of weeks.

In Which There Is Office Sex - mermaidstailonmyface

Summary: Dan and Phil have sex in an office.

Is That a Yes? - anonymous

Summary: The whole office stared at Phil as he pushed away from his desk and walked past rows of computers and wires. They glanced at him; no one was ever called to Mr Howell’s office, except his assistant Nina. The last time anyone was called to his office was to be fired.

On The Other Side Of The Glass - fleurdelester

Summary: au where your otp work in neighboring building and their offices face each other and have never met but whenever one looks really stressed the other makes faces through the windows until they’ve cheered up.

Pastel Office - pastelflours

Summary: When the seemingly emotionless office manager, Phil Lester, arrives to work one day with a pretty pastel boy on his arm, the office begins to speculate on the relationship of the two.

The Guy in the Cubicle - danisnotlikingvagina

Summary: Dan works at a boring desk job. The only reason why he doesn’t quit is because it pays the rent and has a huge crush on Phil, who is the boss/supervisor.

The Proposal - fiction-phan

Summary: Dan Howell is the executive chief of a very known company which deals with publishing best seller books. He is hated but everyone in the office but everyone is too scared of him to say anything, unless they want to get fired. Phil Lester is his assistant. As much as he hates Dan and the way he treats him, Phil keeps quiet because of his dream of becoming an editor. When Dan learns that he might be facing deportation charges because of his expired visa, he convinces Phil to marry him in order for all charges to be dropped. The plan is to get a divorce after a few years but a weekend spent in Phil’s family house might just change both their plans, and the way they think.

The Real Reason Phil Goes To Work - analphancones

Summary: Phil cheats on his wife with his sexy assistant, Dan Howell. Dan is young and hot and exactly what Phil’s wife isn’t, and Dan is just what he needs to make his problems better.

You’re My Sole Rival - jilliancares

Summary: In which you wear your soulmate’s name on one wrist and your enemy’s on the other, but Dan has the same name on both.

When Dan learns that he might be facing deportation charges because of his expired visa, he convinces Phil to marry him in order for all charges to be dropped. The plan is to get a divorce after a few years but a weekend spent in Phil’s family house might just change both their plans, and the way they think.

The Real Reason Phil Goes To Work - analphancones

Summary: Phil cheats on his wife with his sexy assistant, Dan Howell. Dan is young and hot and exactly what Phil’s wife isn’t, and Dan is just what he needs to make his problems better.

You’re My Sole Rival - jilliancares

Summary: In which you wear your soulmate’s name on one wrist and your enemy’s on the other, but Dan has the same name on both.
trail.content:
Links Last Checked: May 22nd, 2019

Acknowledged - trysomecats

Summary: Rich CEO Phil Lester meets Dan Howell, an adorable pastel-colored boy who is looking for a job, and decides that he has to hire him immediately.

Ain’t That Just What Christmas Is All About? - howellslester

Summary: Christmas is the one time of the year Phil really hates in the office. It’s all Vic’s fault, really, because being the boss (albeit not a very good one) he orders mandatory fun and games for a week, when Phil would much rather be doing his brainwashing job.

Business Trip - washedoutgay

Summary: Phil starts a job and sadly gets paired with a rather grouchy man to go on a business trip with, but a different emotion to hatred is discovered on the trip.

Christmas Candy Grams - auroraphilealis

Summary: Dan gets a candy gram at his workplace from a secret admirer calling him an angel, but Dan has absolutely no idea who it could be.

Daydreams - placingglaciers

Summary: Nothing like a Christmas-in-July party can’t fix for two shy office crushes!

Down To Business - phanimist

Summary: Phil’s got a business meeting, and he’s lucky that he makes it there on time with seconds to spare. he takes the last available seat at the back of the room, which happens to be next to a pretty brunette who ends up making sarcastic remarks and jokes under his breath the whole time. Phil isn’t complaining, though. If anything, he’s glad that that he was almost late.

Fixing The Connection - jestbee

Summary: Dan has had a crush on the IT guy in his office for ages, not that he’ll ever admit to it.

“Get On Your Knees” - your-precious-phan-blog

Summary: Phil loves to tease Dan during work hours.

Here’s To Our Story (ao3) - amczingphil

Summary: Dan is a bored office worker with a crush on the cute IT guy - Phil.

Naturally Dan decides that the best way to get Phil’s attention would be to fabricate a series of technical issues that he has to call Phil to help with. It’s just a shame Dan wasn’t a little less transparent.

How To Get Away With Marriage - humhowellelujah

Summary: Dan works at a small office doing coffee runs. His boss, Mr. Lester, needs Dan to do him a favor while his parents are in town for the next couple of weeks.

In Which There Is Office Sex - mermaidstailonmyface

Summary: Dan and Phil have sex in an office.

Is That a Yes? - anonymous

Summary: The whole office stared at Phil as he pushed away from his desk and walked past rows of computers and wires. They glanced at him; no one was ever called to Mr Howell’s office, except his assistant Nina. The last time anyone was called to his office was to be fired.

On The Other Side Of The Glass - fleurdelester

Summary: au where your otp work in neighboring building and their offices face each other and have never met but whenever one looks really stressed the other makes faces through the windows until they’ve cheered up.

Pastel Office - pastelflours

Summary: When the seemingly emotionless office manager, Phil Lester, arrives to work one day with a pretty pastel boy on his arm, the office begins to speculate on the relationship of the two.

The Guy in the Cubicle - danisnotlikingvagina

Summary: Dan works at a boring desk job. The only reason why he doesn’t quit is because it pays the rent and has a huge crush on Phil, who is the boss/supervisor.

The Proposal - fiction-phan

Summary: Dan Howell is the executive chief of a very known company which deals with publishing best seller books. He is hated but everyone in the office but everyone is too scared of him to say anything, unless they want to get fired. Phil Lester is his assistant. As much as he hates Dan and the way he treats him, Phil keeps quiet because of his dream of becoming an editor. When Dan learns that he might be facing deportation charges because of his expired visa, he convinces Phil to marry him in order for all charges to be dropped. The plan is to get a divorce after a few years but a weekend spent in Phil’s family house might just change both their plans, and the way they think.

The Real Reason Phil Goes To Work - analphancones

Summary: Phil cheats on his wife with his sexy assistant, Dan Howell. Dan is young and hot and exactly what Phil’s wife isn’t, and Dan is just what he needs to make his problems better.

You’re My Sole Rival - jilliancares

Summary: In which you wear your soulmate’s name on one wrist and your enemy’s on the other, but Dan has the same name on both.

summary: the description does literally just say "a couple" in the context of "there are comic moderate sex references as a couple dress...
question: the description does literally just say "a couple" in the context of "there are comic moderate sex references as a couple dress up as a cop and robber and one pleads 'please be gentle with the handcuffs.'" so like... yeah, it's not taken out of context, but i'm relatively certain dnp aren't coming out as a couple via the dvd edition of interactive introverts.
answer: Ah, right. Yeah that’s nothing to curl your nose up at. Because wasn’t the “please be gentle with the handcuffs” bit a part of the show where they show you what they’re not gonna do?
